title: 如何设置服务器所有世界永久不掉落？
author: chizzb
txt_content: 如何设置服务器所有世界永久不掉落？

replies.txt_content:
/gamerule keepinventory true关闭世界掉落
/gamerule keepinventory falis开启

replies.author: Mithey
replies.txt_content: gamerule keepinventory true,mw每个世界都去手动调一次就行了。mv的话一次就行

replies.author: AD【钙奶】
replies.txt_content: 全图(多世界)死亡不掉落:gamerule keepAllInventory true
